    User Page: João Sousa - TechNet Articles - United States (English) - TechNet Wiki

    João Sousa lives in Portugal and he currently works as a Software Engineer at DevScope (www.devscope.net). In the last years he has been working implementing integration scenarios and Cloud Provisioning at a major telecommunications service provider in Portugal.

User pages on TechNet Wiki exist for the following reasons: (1) To link to these pages from various online profiles, blog posts, etc. (2) To allow collaboration on filling out such information. (3) To allow easy editing for filling out such information. (4) To act as an aggregation or collection of links that help define what a person does.
